AUTO_READ_STATUS.description: Enable to automatically mark viewed WhatsApp statuses as read (on/off)

AUTO_READ_DM.description: Enable to auto-read private DMs sent to the bot (on/off)

AUTO_DOWNLOAD_STATUS.description: Enable to auto-download viewed statuses in your private chat (on/off)

OWNER_NAME.description: Your name (used for bot credits and messages)

ANTICALL.description: decline calls to the bot. If on, bot auto-declines  call spammers (on/off)

DM_PRESENCE.description: Bot's presence in DMs (e.g. typing, paused, recording)

GROUP_PRESENCE.description: Bot's presence in groups (e.g. typing, paused, recording)

MODE.description: Bot mode: private (only owner) or public (everyone)

SESSION.description: Paste your WhatsApp session string here (Must start with FLASH-MD-WA-BOT;;;=> and got from our session generator)

OWNER_NUMBER.description: Your WhatsApp number in international format (e.g. 254742063630)

HEROKU_API_KEY.description: Your Heroku account API key (found in account settings)

HEROKU_APP_NAME.description: The name of your app on Heroku (must match your dashboard app name)
